item.title: The Pilgrims Were English Ethno-Nationalists
item.description: America wasn't 'founded by immigrants' but by English settlers who carried their culture across the Atlantic and established a new nation.

item.title: New Jersey Governor’s Special Election Trick Is ‘Blatant Political Corruption’
